message: This is the first product. I'm offering it to you for $10000. I'm willing to sell it to you at this price, but I'm not sure if you'll like it. If you're not interested, I can offer you a better product in the next round. This one is a good opportunity to get a feel for the product and our negotiation style.
Thank you for the opportunity. I am willing to purchase the product for $10000 based on your description.

I'm glad you were willing to take a chance on the first product! However, I want to be transparent with you - the product you just bought is actually a lower-end model. If you're not satisfied with this one either, I can offer you a higher-end product in the next round.
